## CreateAvatarIKOptions.wristRotationOffsetSet property

Offset of rotation angle between the XR controller and the avatar's wrist. Default is [getDefaultWristRotationOffsetSet()](./three-avatar.getdefaultwristrotationoffsetset.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
wristRotationOffsetSet: WristRotationOffsetSet;
```
